001    package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002    import java.util.HashMap;
003    
004    
005    /**
006     * IRendererController is the common interface for controlling ad renderers.
007     */
008    public abstract interface IRendererController {
009            /**
010             * Pass the event to ad renderer.
011             *
012             * @param type name of the event
013             * <br>
014             * <br>
015             * Available event:<br>
016             *      EVENT_AD_CLICK          -               click on the ad<br>
017             */
018            public void processEvent(String type);
019    
020            /**
021             * See also {@link #processEvent(String)}.
022             *
023             * @param type name of the event.
024             * <br>
025             * <br>
026             * Available event:<br>
027             *      EVENT_AD_MEASUREMENT    -       measurement triggered
028             * <br>
029             * <br>
030             * @param extraInfo additional information need to be processed by AdManager. Available keys:
031             * <br>
032             *                      <br>- INFO_KEY_CONCRETE_EVENT_ID Required when the eventName is EVENT_AD_MEASUREMENT.
033             *                      <br>use this key to specify which measurement event is triggerd.
034             */
035            public void processEvent(String type, HashMap<String, Object> extraInfo);
036    }
